en: Officiellement, sur les cinq serres du Jardin des Plantes,

en: dans le monde de la Furie.

pa: This fifth greenhouse is where The Godfathers of the six families
vi: Nơi thứ năm là nơi các bố già của sáu gia tộc tội phạm gặp gỡ.

pa: who rule organized crime meet.

pa: Business above all.

en: L'homme qui a tué mon père.

Te fie pas à leurs costards et leurs manières.

en: Joseph de la Brenne d'Otrante dit "le Duc".

en: Y a pas un parc ou un mur végétalisé où il fait pas pousser sa drogue.

pa: That's The Californian.

Ils sont fendus du casque, ces trois-là.

J'ai du nouveau sur la mort de Darius Guerrab.

So, after months without a single piece of evidence,

-Huh?
 People who said you were useless probably feel stupid now.

Darius is dead because he stole money from you,

Mẹ kiếp.
 FURY

Let me know if you need help.
 Oh, sure, you can help me, yeah.

Here you go.
 Prone to lousy deals.

Ever.
 -That's all.

What?

Anyway, go get some rest.

Where are you sleeping?

I TURNED OFF THE ALARM, YOU DESERVE TO SLEEP-IN.

Free yourself.
 - No. -Try.

-He's sentimental. He keeps breaking it-- -Hey, whoa, whoa.
 -Can you focus? -Sorry, excuse me.
